A

AbstracDAO - Class in DataAcces
In this class all methods for operations are made Using the reflection techniques we can call these methods with any object, in this case Clients and products Methods getAttributes and getTableFields are made to take easier fields and values of those fields from an object All these methods are implemented similarly by building the query specific for each operation For insert we start the query with "select ", for edit with " update ", for delete with "delete " etc These methods for operations will be called in ClientDAO and ProductDAO
AbstracDAO() - Constructor for class DataAcces.AbstracDAO
 
AdaugareClienti - Class in View
In this interface the user can insert a client by inserting values in all fields

addButton - Variable in class View.AdaugareClienti
 
addClient(Clients) - Static method in class DataAcces.ClientDAO

addProduct(Products) - Static method in class BusinessLogic.ProductBBL
 
addProduct(Products) - Static method in class DataAcces.ProductDAO
 
AgeValidator - Class in BusinessLogic
Age limit check is made is this class.

AllClients - Class in View
Interface for clients view All clients are displayed into a list
